name: Yang Zing Prana
text:
This card gains these effects, based on the number of different Attributes the "Yang Zing" monsters in your Graveyard have.
â—?2 or more: All "Yang Zing" monsters you control gain 500 ATK.
â—?3 or more: If a "Yang Zing" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead.
â—?4 or more: Your opponent cannot Set monsters. Change all face-up monsters your opponent controls to Attack Position.
â—?5 or more: You can send this card to the Graveyard; destroy all cards on the field.
